Package org.jfree.chart.needle

A range of objects that can be used to represent the needle on a CompassPlot.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrowNeedle
    A needle in the shape of an arrow.
    ArrowNeedleTest
    Tests for the ArrowNeedle class.
    LineNeedle
    A needle that is represented by a line.
    LineNeedleTest
    Tests for the LineNeedle class.
    LongNeedle
    A needle that is represented by a long line.
    LongNeedleTest
    Tests for the LongNeedle class.
    MeterNeedle
    The base class used to represent the needle on a CompassPlot.
    MeterNeedleTest
    Tests for the MeterNeedle class.
    MiddlePinNeedle
    A needle that is drawn as a pin shape.
    MiddlePinNeedleTest
    Tests for the MiddlePinNeedle class.
    PinNeedle
    A needle that is drawn as a pin shape.
    PinNeedleTest
    Tests for the PinNeedle class.
    PlumNeedle
    A needle for use with the CompassPlot class.
    PlumNeedleTest
    Tests for the PlumNeedle class.
    PointerNeedle
    A needle in the shape of a pointer, for use with the CompassPlot class.
    PointerNeedleTest
    Tests for the PointerNeedle class.
    ShipNeedle
    A needle in the shape of a ship, for use with the CompassPlot class.
    ShipNeedleTest
    Tests for the ShipNeedle class.
    WindNeedle
    A needle that indicates wind direction, for use with the CompassPlot class.
    WindNeedleTest
    Tests for the WindNeedle class.

Package org.jfree.chart.needle Description

A range of objects that can be used to represent the needle on a CompassPlot.
